description: Multi-chronic patient with diabetes, kidney transplant, heart disease

expected_extractions.rationale: Generic mention without specific complication context
HbA1c 11.1% indicates poor control and hyperglycemia. Home readings 180-280 mg/dL consistently elevated. Type 2 specified in past medical history.
key_phrases: blood sugar control has been suboptimal
blood glucose at home with readings typically ranging from 180-280 mg/dL
HbA1c: 11.1% (significantly elevated, indicating poor glycemic control)
Fasting glucose: 245 mg/dL
Diabetes mellitus Type 2
Diabetes mellitus with hyperglycemia, uncontrolled

expected_extractions.condition: Type 2 diabetes mellitus with diabetic chronic kidney disease
expected_extractions.icd10_display: Type 2 diabetes mellitus with diabetic chronic kidney disease
expected_extractions.rationale: Patient has history of diabetic nephropathy that led to ESRD and kidney transplant. Diabetes with CKD documented.
key_phrases: Diabetic nephropathy - led to ESRD and transplant
Chronic kidney disease - Stage 5, status post kidney transplant
Diabetes mellitus with diabetic chronic kidney disease
Patient's original kidney failure was due to diabetic nephropathy

expected_extractions.rationale: Currently insulin-dependent, using Lantus and Humalog
key_phrases: Currently using Lantus (insulin glargine) 30 units at bedtime and Humalog (insulin lispro) sliding scale
currently insulin-dependent

expected_extractions.condition: Chronic kidney disease status post kidney transplant
expected_extractions.rationale: History of ESRD, though currently transplanted, original diagnosis remains relevant
key_phrases: end-stage renal disease status post kidney transplant
End-stage renal disease - transplanted

expected_extractions.rationale: Current status post kidney transplant 5 years ago
key_phrases: status post kidney transplant 5 years ago
Kidney transplant - 5 years ago, living donor
Transplant kidney function stable
Chronic kidney disease, status post kidney transplant

expected_extractions.icd10_display: Atherosclerotic heart disease of native coronary artery without angina pectoris
expected_extractions.rationale: History of coronary artery disease with prior CABG, currently asymptomatic
key_phrases: coronary artery disease
Coronary artery disease - status post CABG 6 years ago
History of CABG, currently asymptomatic

expected_extractions.rationale: Listed in past medical history, on statin therapy
key_phrases: hyperlipidemia
Hyperlipidemia - on statin therapy
On statin therapy with LDL 98 mg/dL

expected_extractions.rationale: Listed in past medical history, controlled on multiple agents
key_phrases: Hypertension - controlled on multiple agents
Blood pressure 138/86

notes: This complex multi-chronic case requires: (1) Linking HbA1c 11.1% to hyperglycemia, (2) Connecting diabetic nephropathy history to current CKD and transplant status, (3) Maintaining all chronic disease codes (diabetes, CKD, CAD, hyperlipidemia, hypertension), (4) Recognizing both E11.65 and E11.22 can be coded together as patient has both hyperglycemia and diabetic CKD. This is a challenging case for all approaches.
